title: El macho mundo splash art link not working!
body:
The title basicly explains everything but I clicked on "El macho mundo" in the patch notes' "Upcoming skins" tab and the page it then took me to just said the following:
-------------------------------------------
Oops! An Error Occurred

The server returned a "404 Not Found".

Something is broken. Please e-mail us at [email] and let us know what you were doing when this error occurred. We will fix it as soon as possible. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.
-------------------------------------------
It says to email 'us' but hen it doesnt say the email adress so I decided to post it here. It also says to say when it happened but its 20:02 Amsterdam time and the date is 2-6-2016
Tried on phone to see if it was a computer bug but said the same.

Sincerely, CactusPie

replies.body:
Hey CactusPie! 

Thanks for the heads up -  looks like a broken link. D: We'll get this fixed up! :)
